title: Question about Riot Merch Posters
body: I just wanted to know if the poster are the size they say they are, 27x40. I am a frequent buyer of posters and in some cases, the dimensions are different from what was stated (e.g. a poster marked 27x40 ends up being 28x40), since I am planing on buying a frame for the poster, can someone who has bought them, please confirm the actual size?

replies.body:
Hey RooftopCake,

I swung by the merch team, and they said the website is spot on with the size - 27x40. ^-^  Now the question I have for you is, which poster do you have your eye on? :P

Thanks for checking for me :) 

P.s. I'm planing on getting the Leona vs Diana one
You're welcome! I loveeee that poster! I need to order an Arcade Sona poster myself; it's my all time favorite skin. :x
